@param safety: string @if safety === 'typesafe' 1x safe @elseif safety === 'tddsafe' 1x sorta safe @else 1x not safe @endif @if safety === 'tddsafe' 2x sorta safe @elseif safety === 'typesafe' 2x safe @else 2x not safe @endif @if safety === 'nottypesafe' 3x not safe @elseif safety === 'nottddsafe' 3x not sorta safe @else 3x safe @endif
